Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Suryakumar Yadav and Hardik Pandya stitched up the win with some flashy stroke play.
Suryakumar Yadav followed it up by audaciously flicking a fuller one from Matheesha Pathirana over deep fine leg’s head.
Hardik Pandya had Kusal Perera and Kamindu Mendis caught by Rinku at deep square leg, triggering the home side’s collapse.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain disrupted the match, and the game was called to a halt in the first over of the Indian chase when the skies opened up.
Sri Lanka endured another middle-order collapse to settle for a sub-par total of 161 for nine wickets.
Others: Sanju Samson was caught off guard first ball by a quicker off-break from Maheesh Theekshana which disturbed his stumps.
Ravi Bishnoi ended with a three-wicket haul.
